name: Goblin Musketeer
description: The Goblin Musketeer is a small, agile humanoid adept at ranged combat, often working in tandem with fellow goblins to maximize their effectiveness. It carries a musket and wields a shortsword for close encounters.
memorable: Its ability to coordinate with another musketeer to increase attack effectiveness makes it a clever and agile opponent.
goals: Typically seeks to ambush and attack from a distance while avoiding direct confrontation.
relations: Often found among groups of goblins or as part of a tactical ambush.
environment: Commonly located in forests, dungeons, or areas where goblins reside.
strengths: Skilled in stealth and able to deliver significant damage from a distance with a musket.
weaknesses: Fragile due to low hit points, struggles in melee combat, and vulnerable to direct attacks.
attacks: Utilizes a musket for strong ranged attacks dealing 10 piercing damage and occasionally engages with a shortsword in close combat.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to coordinate with another goblin musketeer to gain advantage on ranged attack rolls.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 60 feet, allowing it to see in low-light conditions.
skills: Has a proficiency in stealth, resulting in a +3 modifier.
additional_information: Cooperates effectively with other goblin musketeers for coordinated attacks.
Can use Nimble Escape to disengage or hide as a bonus action.
Low strength makes it weak in melee confrontations.
Average Constitution means it withstands minimal damage.
Considered a low-level adversary, yet effective in groups.
